name: 11 Keys To Your Heart
description:
I made everything myself from scratch during the jam (except the music loop made by my girlfriend). I used Unity, Aseprite and Audacity.

I severly ran out of time at the end, but managed to have the main gameplay and levels to work as intended. Thus the end being a little abrupt and not much explanations in game (levels are meant to explain themself with gameplay as much as possible, let's hope it's enough).
